assessment.title: üéØ Is my advisory right for you?
assessment.subtitle: Identify your challenges and find out if we're the right partner for your AI strategy.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You know that data and AI can create value ‚Äî but the connection to revenue, costs, or differentiation isn't always clear.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Without clear connection to business goals, efforts become isolated, unfocused, or purely experimental ‚Äî with low ROI.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I bridge the strategy-implementation gap by connecting AI initiatives with tangible business outcomes and creating a focused, value-driven roadmap.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You're working under intense time pressure with multiple competing priorities.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: AI and data decisions are complex, technical, and easily delayed ‚Äî or made incorrectly ‚Äî without the right insights.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I provide concise, executive-ready advisory that accelerates intelligent decision-making and simplifies complex landscapes.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: The market is flooded with AI promises, tools, and platforms.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Leaders struggle to distinguish what's truly valuable from what's just buzz ‚Äî risking paralysis or misinvestment.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I serve as a trusted filter ‚Äî evaluating trends, technologies, and vendors to focus efforts on what's mature, meaningful, and aligned with business requirements.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: Every company collects data ‚Äî but most don't fully leverage it to drive insights or automation.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Poor data quality, silos, or unclear ownership often block progress and make AI efforts slow or ineffective.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I help assess data readiness, build foundational capabilities, and prioritize use cases that unlock immediate and long-term value.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You want to use AI to increase revenue, improve margins, or differentiate from competitors.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: You often don't know where to start, or lack internal capabilities to move beyond pilot projects.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I identify quick wins and scalable strategies that help companies use AI for meaningful, measurable advantage.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: Data and AI create value ‚Äî but also expose companies to regulatory, ethical, and reputational risks.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Without strategy for responsible AI use, companies risk non-compliance, biased outcomes, or public backlash.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I bring proven governance frameworks and ethical design principles to ensure AI is deployed safely, responsibly, and in compliance with emerging regulations.
